videos.title: TV5MONDE
videos.subtitle:
TV5Monde, formerly known as TV5, is a French television network, broadcasting several channels of French-language programming. It is an approved participant member of the European Broadcasting Union.[2]


Available in United Kingdom and across Europe via Astra 19.2 E FTA and Eutelsat 19 E FTA and streaming online and on the TvPlayer app

videos.title: France 24
videos.subtitle: France 24 (France vingt-quatre in French and Arabic channels, France veinticuatro in Spanish channel) is a French state-owned international news television network based in Paris.[1] Its channels broadcast in French, English, Arabic, and Spanish and are aimed at the overseas market.
